resources.string: Select the services that are right for you!

At Superior Janitorial Systems we pride ourselves on being the most connected janitorial service in the bay area. You can send us a message 24/7. This app helps make that happen. Tap "Using the app" to see how it works.

This app is used for our clients to connect with us on the go. Simply tap the connect button at the bottom and then select what type of message you want to send. Not a client yet? Just tap the Request Estimate card. Need to leave us a note? Tap the Leave a Note for Janitors card. Its that easy.
Superior Janitorial Systems is a commercial cleaning service located in the South Bay Area in San Jose, CA.
Description of office and size in SQFT. (Required)

1. Please Let us know the second that something is wrong.
2. Please be specific.
3. Please read our policy page.
4. All Notes must be submitted before 3:00pm for same day service.
5. Remember to LABEL your TRASH that is not in a trash can.

1. You must make your request 24 hours in advance.
2. Larger items like free standing copiers require an appointment.
3. All itmes must be labled E-Waste.
4. We do not take larger items like refrigerators

 We do not take: CFLs, Fluorescent tubes, Non-prescription or prescription drugs and Hazardous Waste.

We do take: All office electronics, home electronics, anything computer related, small kitchen appliances, batteries.

Please fill out the form below to schedule you free estimate.

We will contact you promptly to confirm the date and time of your walk through.

Superior Janitorial Systems
4858 Tilden Dr.
San Jose, CA 95124
